attributes.title: Demon's Souls Song - "Rekindled"
attributes.caption: Back from our break and back with a bang with this Demon's Souls Song!
attributes.description: Back from our break and back with a bang with this Demon's Souls Song!

attributes.title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla Rap - "Legends Fall"
attributes.caption: This has been one of the most requested games to cover and we hope it doesn't disappoint! Enjoy our Assassin's Creed Valhalla Rap we made with Fabvl featuring Andrea Storm Kaden!
attributes.description: This has been one of the most requested games to cover and we hope it doesn't disappoint! Enjoy our Assassin's Creed Valhalla Rap we made with Fabvl featuring Andrea Storm Kaden!

attributes.title: Among Us Space Shanty - "The Mutineer"
attributes.caption: What's cooler than pirates?! Space Pirates. Enjoy our Among Us Space Shanty!!!
attributes.description: What's cooler than pirates?! Space Pirates. Enjoy our Among Us Space Shanty!!!

attributes.title: DOOM Eternal Rap - "Outdeviled"
attributes.caption: We're back at you with another DOOM Eternal Rap! This time focused around the new "The Ancient Gods" DLC.
attributes.description: We're back at you with another DOOM Eternal Rap! This time focused around the new "The Ancient Gods" DLC.

attributes.title: Little Nightmares 2 Song - "Nightmares Never End"
attributes.caption: We follow up one our personal favorites in "Hungry for Another One" with this Little Nightmares 2 Rap dubbed "Nightmares Never End"!
attributes.description: We follow up one our personal favorites in "Hungry for Another One" with this Little Nightmares 2 Rap dubbed "Nightmares Never End"!

attributes.title: The Last of Us 2 Song - "Dear Ellie (Take Care, Take Heed)"
attributes.caption: We worked with one of our buddies, JR Wyatt, to create a song that takes a look at what a message or song from Joel to Ellie would've sounded like. Well because...you know...
attributes.description: We worked with one of our buddies, JR Wyatt, to create a song that takes a look at what a message or song from Joel to Ellie would've sounded like. Well because...you know...
attributes.display_title: The Last of Us 2 Song - "Dear Ellie (Take Care, Take Heed)"

attributes.title: Resident Evil Village Song - "Tall Woman"
attributes.caption: Lady Dimistrescu is tall. Here's a song called Tall Woman.
attributes.description: Lady Dimistrescu is tall. Here's a song called Tall Woman.

attributes.title: Zelda Breath of the Wild Rap - "Wild Heart"
attributes.caption: We just had to get around to this game sooner or later! Hope you enjoy our Zelda Breath of the Wild Rap!
attributes.description: We just had to get around to this game sooner or later! Hope you enjoy our Zelda Breath of the Wild Rap!
attributes.display_title: Zelda Breath of the Wild Rap - "Wild Heart"

attributes.title: Call of Duty Cold War Rap - "Endzone"
attributes.caption: You know we had to channel a little bit of that 80's synth-pop in a Call of Duty Cold War Song. Hope you enjoy it!
attributes.description: You know we had to channel a little bit of that 80's synth-pop in a Call of Duty Cold War Song. Hope you enjoy it!
attributes.display_title: Call of Duty Cold War Rap - "Endzone"

attributes.title: The Mandalorian Rap - "One Hell of a Dad" (Live Action Music Video Version)
attributes.caption: We revisited our Mando Song with a live-action music video. We had a good time putting this one together with some good old-fashioned fish out of water AND dad humor. Hope ya dig it.
attributes.description: We revisited our Mando Song with a live-action music video. We had a good time putting this one together with some good old-fashioned fish out of water AND dad humor. Hope ya dig it.
attributes.display_title: The Mandalorian Rap - "One Hell of a Dad" (Live Action Music Video Version)

attributes.title: Friday Night Funkin' Song
attributes.caption: Enjoy some video game music about a music video game with our Friday Night Funkin' Song!
attributes.description: Enjoy some video game music about a music video game with our Friday Night Funkin' Song!

attributes.title: Rise of The Tomb Raider Rap - "On The Rise"
attributes.caption: We made this song nearly 6 years ago with Skull rapping as Lara Croft. A fan had a great idea and suggested, "why not have Andrea perform it?" And so here we are.
attributes.description: We made this song nearly 6 years ago with Skull rapping as Lara Croft. A fan had a great idea and suggested, "why not have Andrea perform it?" And so here we are.
attributes.display_title: Rise of The Tomb Raider Rap - "On The Rise"

attributes.title: Days Gone Rap - "Days Go By"
attributes.caption: A resurgence in Days Gone's popularity was just the excuse we needed to get a song made for it. Hope you enjoy!
attributes.description: A resurgence in Days Gone's popularity was just the excuse we needed to get a song made for it. Hope you enjoy!

attributes.title: Ahsoka Tano Song - "Rise Up"
attributes.caption: One of the most beloved Star Wars characters, Ahsoka Tano gets her own song!
attributes.description: One of the most beloved Star Wars characters, Ahsoka Tano gets her own song!

attributes.title: Loki Rap - "In Love With Myself"
attributes.caption: The soundtrack of Loki was just too dang tantalizing to not inspire a song. The show was pretty good too
attributes.description: The soundtrack of Loki was just too dang tantalizing to not inspire a song. The show was pretty good too

attributes.title: The Winter Soldier Rap - "Back to the Fire"
attributes.caption: Skull returns with this Winter Soldier Rap! Pretty convenient they both look alike!
attributes.description: Skull returns with this Winter Soldier Rap! Pretty convenient they both look alike!
attributes.display_title: The Winter Soldier Rap - "Back to the Fire"

attributes.title: Horizon Zero Dawn Song - "The Dawn"
attributes.caption: A beefy collab of JT Music, Andrea Storm Kaden, CG5, and Rockit Gaming brings you this Horizon Zero Dawn Song! It's a song of hope and perseverance, which felt pretty fitting these days!
attributes.description: A beefy collab of JT Music, Andrea Storm Kaden, CG5, and Rockit Gaming brings you this Horizon Zero Dawn Song! It's a song of hope and perseverance, which felt pretty fitting these days!

attributes.title: Venom 2 Rap - "Your Better Half"
attributes.caption: You all loved the first Venom Rap so much we decided to come back at ya with another track for Venom 2!
attributes.description: You all loved the first Venom Rap so much we decided to come back at ya with another track for Venom 2!

attributes.title: Back 4 Blood Rap - "Nothing Like the Rest"
attributes.caption: One of our first songs was a Left 4 Dead Rap so it's pretty cool to come back around with a Back 4 Blood Rap for you all!
attributes.description: One of our first songs was a Left 4 Dead Rap so it's pretty cool to come back around with a Back 4 Blood Rap for you all!
attributes.display_title: Back 4 Blood Rap - "Nothing Like the Rest"

attributes.title: Metroid Dread Rap - "Dread"
attributes.caption: Andrea kills it on this Metroid Dread Rap! Hope you enjoyed the song and that it's the perfect companion to playing the game!
attributes.description: Andrea kills it on this Metroid Dread Rap! Hope you enjoyed the song and that it's the perfect companion to playing the game!
